name: A Night in that Horrible House at the End of the Lane
name_original: A Night in that Horrible House at the End of the Lane
description:
Welcome to A Night in that Horrible House at the End of the Lane!

The horrible house was an open collaboration to create the many rooms of a haunted house. Each room represents the contribution of a separate collaborator, who all were given the same assets to start and some guidelines.

(if you get a blank screen on loading, try refreshing)

(might not work on mobile)

Rooms/ Contributors :

  • Listening Room - Sunspider
  • Spoopy Poop - s3llsw0rd
  • Library - Haché
  • Sculpture Garden - Noah Boa Boo
  • Gear Room / Gate Room - AYolland
  • Bath room / Pool - enui
  • Storage room - enui
  • Darkroom - enui
  • Foundation Crack - Dan Lance
  • Multi-room Attic - Daniel Stanfill
  • Parlor Room - Jacob Naasz

Mouth sounds by Ian Walker

Many, many thanks to the Society of Play and the Bitsy Discord, without their help and support I wouldn't have been able to even come close to putting this all together!

special thanks to Ducklingsmith, Sean S LeBanc and Matt DeKrey for helping me put together the horrible mouth sounds hack
